AddMediaTag.title: AddMediaTag
AddMediaTag.summary: Adds a tag to a media file.

AddPipeline.title: AddPipeline
AddPipeline.summary: Adds an ApsaraVideo Media Processing (MPS) queue.

AddSmarttagTemplate.title: AddSmarttagTemplate
AddSmarttagTemplate.summary: Adds an analysis template of a smart tagging job.

AddTemplate.title: AddTemplate
AddTemplate.summary: Creates a custom transcoding template. You need to configure the information such as the container format, video stream settings, and audio stream settings.

BindOutputBucket.title: BindOutputBucket
BindOutputBucket.summary: Binds an output media bucket to the media library.

CreateCustomEntity.title: CreateCustomEntity
CreateCustomEntity.summary: Creates a custom entity in a custom library.

CreateFpShotDB.title: CreateFpShotDB
CreateFpShotDB.summary: Submits a job of creating a media fingerprint library.

DeleteCustomEntity.title: DeleteCustomEntity
DeleteCustomEntity.summary: Deletes a custom entity from a custom library.

DeleteCustomView.title: DeleteCustomView
DeleteCustomView.summary: Deletes an image of a custom entity in a custom library.

DeleteMedia.title: DeleteMedia
DeleteMedia.summary: Deletes media files from ApsaraVideo Media Processing (MPS).

DeleteMediaTag.title: DeleteMediaTag
DeleteMediaTag.summary: Removes a tag for a media file.

DeletePipeline.title: DeletePipeline
DeletePipeline.summary: Deletes an ApsaraVideo Media Processing (MPS) queue.

DeleteSmarttagTemplate.title: DeleteSmarttagTemplate
DeleteSmarttagTemplate.summary: Deletes an analysis template for a smart tagging job.

ImAudit.title: ImAudit
ImAudit.summary: Reviews images and text and returns the review results.

ImportFpShotJob.title: ImportFpShotJob
ImportFpShotJob.summary: Submits a job that imports text files to a text fingerprint library.

ListAllMediaBucket.title: ListAllMediaBucket
ListAllMediaBucket.summary: Queries all media buckets bound to the media library.

ListCustomEntities.title: ListCustomEntities
ListCustomEntities.summary: Queries a list of entities in a custom library.

ListCustomGroups.title: ListCustomGroups
ListCustomGroups.summary: Queries a list of custom libraries.

ListCustomPersons.title: ListCustomPersons
ListCustomPersons.summary: Queries the information about all figures and faces in a specific figure library.

ListCustomViews.title: ListCustomViews
ListCustomViews.summary: Queries a list of images of an entity in a custom library.

ListFpShotFiles.title: ListFpShotFiles
ListFpShotFiles.summary: Queries a list of media files in a media fingerprint library.

ListFpShotImportJob.title: ListFpShotImportJob
ListFpShotImportJob.summary: Queries a job that imports text files to a text fingerprint library.

ListMediaWorkflowExecutions.title: ListMediaWorkflowExecutions
ListMediaWorkflowExecutions.summary: Queries the execution instances of a media workflow.

QueryAnalysisJobList.title: QueryAnalysisJobList
QueryAnalysisJobList.summary: Queries template analysis jobs. After the template analysis jobs are complete, available preset templates are returned.

QueryFpDBDeleteJobList.title: QueryFpDBDeleteJobList
QueryFpDBDeleteJobList.summary: Queries the jobs of clearing or deleting a media fingerprint library.

QueryFpFileDeleteJobList.title: QueryFpFileDeleteJobList
QueryFpFileDeleteJobList.summary: Queries jobs of deleting media files from a media fingerprint library.

QueryFpShotJobList.title: QueryFpShotJobList
QueryFpShotJobList.summary: Queries media fingerprint analysis jobs. You can call this operation to query video fingerprint analysis jobs and text fingerprint analysis jobs.

QueryIProductionJob.title: QueryIProductionJob
QueryIProductionJob.summary: Queries the information about a smart production job.

QueryJobList.title: QueryJobList
QueryJobList.summary: Queries transcoding jobs at a time by job ID.

QueryMediaCensorJobDetail.title: QueryMediaCensorJobDetail
QueryMediaCensorJobDetail.summary: Queries the information about a content moderation job.

QueryMediaInfoJobList.title: QueryMediaInfoJobList
QueryMediaInfoJobList.summary: Queries the results of media information analysis jobs.

QueryMediaList.title: QueryMediaList
QueryMediaList.summary: Queries media files based on the IDs of media files.

QueryMediaListByURL.title: QueryMediaListByURL
QueryMediaListByURL.summary: Queries media files based on the Object Storage Service (OSS) URLs of media files.

QueryPipelineList.title: QueryPipelineList
QueryPipelineList.summary: Queries ApsaraVideo Media Processing (MPS) queues based on the queue IDs.

QuerySmarttagTemplateList.title: QuerySmarttagTemplateList
QuerySmarttagTemplateList.summary: Queries the analysis template of a smart tagging job.

QuerySnapshotJobList.title: QuerySnapshotJobList
QuerySnapshotJobList.summary:
The maximum number of entries to return on each page.

\*   Default value: \*\*30\*\*.
\*   Valid values: \*\*\\[1,300]\*\*.

QueryTemplateList.title: QueryTemplateList
QueryTemplateList.summary:
You can call this operation to query up to 10 transcoding templates at a time.

\### QPS limits

You can call this operation up to 100 times per second. If the number of calls per second exceeds the limit, throttling is triggered. As a result, your business may be affected. We recommend that you take note of the limit when you call this operation. For more information, see \[QPS limit]\(~~342832~~).

RegisterCustomView.title: RegisterCustomView
RegisterCustomView.summary: Registers an image of a custom entity.

ReportFpShotJobResult.title: ReportFpShotJobResult
ReportFpShotJobResult.summary: This operation provides feedback only on the results of failed media fingerprint analysis jobs.

SearchMediaWorkflow.title: SearchMediaWorkflow
SearchMediaWorkflow.summary: Queries media workflows in the specified state.

SearchPipeline.title: SearchPipeline
SearchPipeline.summary: Searches for ApsaraVideo Media Processing (MPS) queues in the specified state.

SearchTemplate.title: SearchTemplate
SearchTemplate.summary:
You can call this operation to query custom transcoding templates in the specified state.

\### QPS limits

You can call this operation up to 100 times per second. If the number of calls per second exceeds the limit, throttling is triggered. As a result, your business may be affected. We recommend that you take note of the limit when you call this operation. For more information, see \[QPS limit]\(~~342832~~).

SubmitAnalysisJob.title: SubmitAnalysisJob
SubmitAnalysisJob.summary: Submits a preset template analysis job.

SubmitFpDBDeleteJob.title: SubmitFpDBDeleteJob
SubmitFpDBDeleteJob.summary: Submits a job of clearing or deleting a media fingerprint library.

SubmitFpFileDeleteJob.title: SubmitFpFileDeleteJob
SubmitFpFileDeleteJob.summary: Submits a job of deleting media files from a media fingerprint library.

SubmitFpShotJob.title: SubmitFpShotJob
SubmitFpShotJob.summary: Submits a media fingerprint analysis job to query the media fingerprint repository for a media file with the identical or similar fingerprint as the input file.

SubmitJobs.title: SubmitJobs
SubmitJobs.summary: Submits transcoding jobs. If the transcoding jobs and workflows created in the ApsaraVideo Media Processing (MPS) console cannot meet your business requirements, you can call the SubmitJobs operation to submit transcoding jobs. Specify transcoding parameters as required when you call the SubmitJobs operation.

SubmitMediaInfoJob.title: SubmitMediaInfoJob
SubmitMediaInfoJob.summary: Submits a media information analysis job.

TagCustomPerson.title: TagCustomPerson
TagCustomPerson.summary: Adds tags to a custom figure library or a figure.

UnbindOutputBucket.title: UnbindOutputBucket
UnbindOutputBucket.summary: Unbinds an output media bucket from the media library.

UnregisterCustomFace.title: UnregisterCustomFace
UnregisterCustomFace.summary: Deletes a custom face, all the custom faces that are registered in a custom figure library, or a custom figure library.

UpdateMedia.title: UpdateMedia
UpdateMedia.summary: Updates the basic information about a media file.

UpdateMediaCategory.title: UpdateMediaCategory
UpdateMediaCategory.summary: Updates the category to which a media file belongs.

UpdateMediaCover.title: UpdateMediaCover
UpdateMediaCover.summary: Updates the thumbnail of a media file.

UpdateMediaPublishState.title: UpdateMediaPublishState
UpdateMediaPublishState.summary: Updates the publishing status of a media file.

UpdateMediaWorkflow.title: UpdateMediaWorkflow
UpdateMediaWorkflow.summary: Updates the topology of a media workflow.

UpdateMediaWorkflowTriggerMode.title: UpdateMediaWorkflowTriggerMode
UpdateMediaWorkflowTriggerMode.summary: Updates the trigger mode of a media workflow.

UpdatePipeline.title: UpdatePipeline
UpdatePipeline.summary: Updates an ApsaraVideo Media Processing (MPS) queue.

UpdateSmarttagTemplate.title: UpdateSmarttagTemplate
UpdateSmarttagTemplate.summary: Updates the analysis template of a smart tagging job.

UpdateTemplate.title: UpdateTemplate
UpdateTemplate.summary:
A custom transcoding template cannot be updated if it is being used by a job that has been submitted.

\### QPS limits

You can call this operation up to 100 times per second. If the number of calls per second exceeds the limit, throttling is triggered. As a result, your business may be affected. We recommend that you take note of the limit when you call this operation. For more information, see \[QPS limit]\(~~342832~~).

UpdateWaterMarkTemplate.title: UpdateWaterMarkTemplate
UpdateWaterMarkTemplate.summary: Updates the name and configurations of the specified watermark template.
